title: Headshots
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the player headshots in the box scoreboard under the scrubber:
1. Now Batting
2. Pitching
custom_expected:
THEN the correct player headshot is seen in the thumbnail
AND if no headshot is available a default silhouette is featured

title: Launch New Audio
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to Broadcast Options
custom_expected: THEN the user can launch an alternative Audio Feed (TV, Radio, Spanish Radio)

title: Non-Enabled
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the CC button on the video player
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to keep CC off
AND captions will not be displayed on screen

title: Home Team
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is switching their current video to another game
custom_steps: WHEN the new game’s video player launches
custom_expected: THEN the home team’s video and audio feed will begin playing

title: ES Device Language
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is switching their current video to another game
custom_steps: WHEN the new game’s video player launches
custom_expected: THEN the home team’s video and the spanish audio feed begins playing

title: Tapping TV Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is switching their current video feed to another video feed for the same game

AND the user taps on the TV button (Screen icon) on the video player
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a video feed from the list
custom_expected:
THEN the user will launch a new video playback for their desired TV feed

AND the user can do the same for Audio Feeds

title: Broadcast Options
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is switching their current video feed to another video feed for the same game

AND the user navigates to "Broadcast Options" on the video player (Possibly ONLY Connected Device)
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a different Video Feed
custom_expected:
THEN the new TV video feed will launch
AND a new Audio Feed can also be selected

title: Select a Feed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps on a game from the Out of Town scoreboard banner on the top of the video player
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a new game from the "Select a Feed" options
custom_expected: THEN the expected TV Video Feed will launch with proper playback

title: Games Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps on a game from the Games tab under the scrubber (Possible Connected Device ONLY)
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches their desired TV Feed
custom_expected: THEN playback begins as expected with the proper TV Feed

title: Full Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has started playback before the live game begins play
custom_steps: WHEN the user allows a full live game to stream in completion, including postgame or end slate
custom_expected:
THEN the player will close gracefully
AND the app will not crash
AND the user will be sent back to the previous page where media was launched from

title: Score Updates
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has started playback before the live game begins play
custom_steps: WHEN the user allows the stream to continue to play without any interruption or exiting
custom_expected: THEN the data in the player scoreboard will continue to update with the correct stats as the game progresses

title: Innings Updates
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has started playback before the live game begins play
custom_steps: WHEN the user allows the stream to continue to play without any interruption or exiting
custom_expected: THEN the innings markers should update with the proper live stats as the game progresses

title: Stats Updates
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has started playback before the live game begins play
custom_steps: WHEN the user allows the stream to continue to play without any interruption or exiting
custom_expected: THEN game stats displayed in all sections of the video player should update properly and accurately for the end user as the game progresses

title: Launching Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has started playback before the live game begins play
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the video playback slate prior to the tv broadcast beginning
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a slate that displays "Event Will Begin Shortly"

AND the slate will transition into a TV broadcast feed once live

title: End of Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has completed a live MLB game
AND also a postgame if available
custom_steps: WHEN the MLB tv feed broadcast transitions into an End slate
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a "Thank You For Watching" slate displayed on the video player.

title: Watch Live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live feed from the following sections:

1. Watch tab's Watch Now Games Carousel
2. Watch tab's Watch Now Hero
3. Watch tab's 'Games' segment
4. Home tab's Scoreboard MLB.tv button
5. Score tab's scoreboard MLB.tv button
6. Gameday's MLB.tv Feed Button
custom_steps: WHEN the video playback begins
custom_expected: THEN the user will be sent to the live point in the game

title: Watch Live (Connected Devices)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live feed from any of the following areas (some may not be included on connected devices):

'Game' tab's Game Tile
'Home' tab's Games carousel
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the game tile for the live game being streamed
AND selects the desired broadcast to watch
custom_expected:
THEN the user will have the option to Watch Live
AND selecting 'Watch Live' will send the user to the live point in the broadcast

title: Resume Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live feed from any of the following areas (some may not be included on connected devices):

'Game' tab's Game Tile
'Home' tab's Games carousel

AND the user previously viewed this game's broadcast video player long enough to bookmark their spot in the game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the game tile for the live game being streamed
AND selects the desired broadcast to watch
custom_expected:
THEN the user will have the option to resume the game broadcast
AND selecting 'Resume' will begin playback at the last watched point in the game's tv broadcast

title: Start Broadcast From Beginning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live feed from any of the following areas (some may not be included on connected devices):

'Game' tab's Game Tile
'Home' tab's Games carousel
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the game tile for the live game being streamed
AND selects the desired broadcast to watch
custom_expected:
THEN the user will have the option to Start From Beginning
AND selecting this option will begin the video stream at the pregame slate

title: Hero Playback Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live feed from the Hero section of the following segments:'Watch Now' or 'Home', depending on platform

AND Hide Spoilers is NOT enabled
custom_steps: WHEN live game broadcast playback begins
custom_expected: THEN the user will be sent to the live point in the broadcast

title: Hide Spoilers Enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live feed from the Hero section of the following segments:'Watch Now' or 'Home', depending on platform

AND Hide Spoilers IS enabled
custom_steps: WHEN video playback begins
custom_expected: THEN the broadcast playback will begin at the beginning of the stream and not the live point

title: Exit Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is viewing a live game
AND the user wishes to exit the stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the 'X' button on the video player
OR the user presses the back button on their connected device remote: (Example: 'Menu' on Apple TV)
custom_expected:
THEN the user will exit the video player
AND the user will be sent back to the previous page where the content was launched from

title: Resume a Live Game
custom_preconds:
*May or May Not Be a Valid Test Case*

GIVEN the user has watched a live broadcast for an extended time long enough to enable bookmarks

AND the user exits the live stream
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates back to that same stream and attempts to launch their desired broadcast
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be asked to resume the broadcast
AND selecting 'Resume' will begin playback at the exit point of the previous session

title: No Bookmarking available
custom_preconds:
May or May Not Be a Valid Test Case

GIVEN the user has watched a live broadcast to the point of completion

AND the video feed ends
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to launch the game again
custom_expected: THEN an option to resume to the feed is not available since the user watched the whole game

title: Hide Scores
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Hide Scores enabled
AND the user is utilizing a game's video player scrubber (Live or Archived)
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrubs through the game
custom_expected:
THEN then innings markers will not populate unless the user scrubs past that point in the stream

AND any spoiler information is hidden unless the user scrubs to that point deliberately.

title: Live Point
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is utilizing a live game's video player scrubber
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrubs to the live point of the game
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see that the Live icon is displayed with a red icon

AND the user can scrub to a previous point in the game

title: RW/FF
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is utilizing the video player's scrubber
custom_steps: WHEN the user elects to use the RW/FF feature to change the spot in the stream
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be sent back or forward 15-30 seconds depending on platform.

AND the FF feature is not available at the live point

title: Innings Markers
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the quick action buttons
AND the innings markets are in focus
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to navigate through different innings by selecting the top or bottom of the inning (May include runs or 0)

title: Logos
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the logos available in the following areas:

1. Box Score
2. Feed Selector
3. Metadata on Video Player
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the correct logos for teams in play

title: Refresh
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a Quick Action Item on the video player such as:

1. Inning Marker
custom_expected: THEN the user should see the Batting and Pitching sections refresh as well as the Runs-Hits-Innings in the box score

title: Launch New Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the Games carousel
AND the user selects a new game
custom_expected: THEN the user will successfully launch the expected stream and playback will begin

title: Scores
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Games tab under the playback scrubber
custom_expected: THEN the user will be able to tap on another matchup card

title: Blackouts
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the Games tab under the playback scrubber

AND the user attempts to launch a game that is blacked out in their territory
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive a blackout message

title: Branding
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Games tab under the playback scrubber
custom_expected: THEN the user will see App Partners (AppleTV+, Peacock) displayed on the game card

title: Launching Another Stream
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to Broadcast Options
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to launch the alternate Video Feed

title: Blacked Out/Non-Entitled
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to Broadcast Options
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a Blackout Icon or Non-Entitled Lock Icon on Video Feed options the user cannot launch

title: Audio
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to Broadcast Options
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to launch an alternate Audio Feed (TV, Radio, Spanish Radio)

title: Enabled CC
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the CC option on the video player
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to able to Enable or Disable CC
AND if enabled the user will see captions

title: Non-Enabled
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps: WHEN the user keeps CC non-enabled
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see captions displayed on the video player

title: Exit Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a live or archived game
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Exit (X) on the PiP Mini player
custom_expected: THEN the PiP mini video player will close

title: Screen Position
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Picture-in-Picture button
AND the user selects the positioning option on the mini player
custom_expected:
THEN the user is able to move the PiP mini player to:

1. Top left
2. Top right
3. Bottom left
4. Bottom right

title: Full-Screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the PiP option on the video player

AND the user then selects the Full-Screen option on the PiP mini player
custom_expected: THEN the video player will launch in full-screen again and playback resumes

title: New Video Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live or archived game
AND the user selects the PiP option on the video player
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches another game or video
custom_expected:
THEN the user will have the new game in Full-Screen

AND the PiP video player continues playback

AND the default audio is from the stream in Full-Screen

title: Jump to Live Displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a live game
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrubs back to an earlier point in the live stream
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the "Jump to Live" quick action button available on the video player

AND selecting this option will send the user to the live point.

title: Jump to Live - Not Displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a live game
custom_steps: WHEN the user is at the live point of the stream
custom_expected: THEN the "Jump to Live" quick action button is NOT displayed

title: Chromecast Displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live or archived game

AND the user's mobile/tablet device is on the same network as their Chromecast device
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the buttons available on their stream's video player
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Chromecast button available 

AND selecting this button will allow the user to connect to the Chromecast receiver

title: Chromecast Not Displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live or archived game

AND the user's mobile/tablet device is not connected to the same network as their Chromecast device
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the video player's quick action buttons
custom_expected: THEN the Chromecast button will NOT be displayed

title: Video Feed Options
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live game
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the TV Feed Selector button (May be only mobile devices)
custom_expected: THEN the users will see an option to launch the Away or Home feed depending on the current stream selected.

title: Audio Feed Options
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a live game stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the TV Feed Selector button (May be only mobile devices)

AND the user views the "Audio Feed" section
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to select an alternate Audio Feed from the default Video Feed that was initially launched

title: 15 Second FF/RW
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has launched a live game

AND the user observes the available video player options on their platform

AND the Fast Forward or Rewind buttons are available
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on 15-second Fast Forward 
OR the user taps on 15-second Rewind
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be sent back 15-seconds in the stream

OR the user will move forward 15-seconds into the stream

AND fast forwarding to the live point will disable the 15-second fast forward button

title: 30 Second FF/RW
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has launched a live game

AND the user observes the available video player options on their platform

AND the Fast Forward or Rewind buttons are available
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on 30-second Fast Forward
OR the user taps on 30-second Rewind
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be sent back 30-seconds in the stream

OR the user will move forward 30-seconds into the stream

AND fast forwarding to the live point will disable the 30-second fast forward button

title: Swiping Down/Up
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live game
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the user swipes down from the top of the player
2. WHEN the user swipes up from the bottom of the player
custom_expected:
1. THEN the out-of-town scoreboard will appear
2. THEN the box score will appear

AND the user can dismiss these overlays by reversing their actions OR by tapping on the data stack button twice.

title: Button Overlay
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live game
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the data stack button on the video player (example: layered square icon on bottom-left on iOS)
custom_expected:
THEN the out of town scoreboard and the box score overlays will be displayed

AND the user can dismiss these stacks by tapping on the button again OR by swiping up/down on the top or bottom of the video player.

title: Launching New Game w/OOTS enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has enabled the data stack button while watching a live game

AND the out-of-town scoreboard is visible
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a different stream from the Out of town scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the new video playback will launch with the out-of-town scoreboard still enabled (data stack enabled still)

title: Non-Enabled Data Stack OOTS
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has not enabled the data stack button while watching a live game

AND the out-of-town scoreboard is NOT visible
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches another game's live stream from the out of town scoreboard by swiping down to display the games
custom_expected: THEN the new video player launches without the out-of-town scoreboard still displayed (Data stack wasn't enabled during previous playback, only swiping to display)

title: Muting the video audio
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live game
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the volume button on the video player
custom_expected: THEN the audio will mute

title: Unmute video audio
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live game
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the volume button (A muted volume button will have a small x)
custom_expected: THEN the audio will unmute and the user can listen to the broadcast audio again

title: Previous Game relaunch button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the video player controller options
AND the user can select to relaunch a previous live stream that was viewed
custom_expected:
THEN the previous live game will relaunch in full-screen
AND playback will resume

title: Deeplink Spanish Language Audio
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has their device language set to Spanish
AND the user launches a live game stream
custom_steps: WHEN playback begins
custom_expected: THEN the user will hear the Spanish tv or radio broadcast at launch

title: Enter Gameday Mode in Video Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live game stream
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Gameday option within the video player
custom_expected:
THEN Gameday mode will be enabled within the video player
AND the video stream will shrink in size in favor for stats

title: Exit Gameday Mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has launched a live game stream
AND the user is utilizing the Gameday feature within the video player
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the user selects the "Exit Gameday" button
2. WHEN the user taps on the back button on device controller
custom_expected:
1. THEN Gameday mode will dismiss with full-screen playback 
2. THEN Gameday mode will dismiss with full-screen playback

title: Closed Captioning Enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has launched a live game stream
AND the user is utilizing Gameday mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Closed Caption button within the Gameday video player
custom_expected:
THEN Closed Captioning will be enabled
AND the user can select the button again to disable

title: Scrubber in Gameday Video Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has launched a live game
AND the user has enabled Gameday mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user utilizes the scrubber in the video player while in Gameday mode
custom_expected:
THEN the user is able to scrub to different points of the live stream
AND the Gameday stats will update from each resume point

title: Data Updates in Gameday
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has launched a live game
AND the user enables Gameday mode in the video player
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the user scrubs through various points of the stream
2. WHEN the user watches the game at the live point
custom_expected:
1. THEN the user will see the data update with the correct stats based on the stream timeline
2. THEN the user will see new data populate as the game continues live playback

title: Watch Live from Hero, Carousel
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live Free content from the app's Hero or Featured carousel
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters the stream
custom_expected: THEN the FLive stream will begin at the live point

title: Scrubber for FLive Content
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live Free content stream from the Hero or Carousel
custom_steps: WHEN the user utilizes the scrubber in the video player
custom_expected: THEN the user will not be able to scrub forward or backwards

title: Closed Caption QAB
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live Free content from the app's Hero or Featured carousel
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the quick action buttons on the video player
custom_expected: THEN the user will be able to enable and disable Closed Caption on the video player

title: Picture-in-Picture in F Live Video Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live Free content from the app's Hero or Featured carousel
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the PiP button on the video player
custom_expected: THEN the FLive stream will be in PiP mode and the video player will be minimized

title: Watch Live from Hero
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live SLive content from the app's Hero or Carousel
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters the stream
custom_expected: THEN the SLive stream will begin at the live point

title: Watch Live from Carousel
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live SLive content from Featured Carousel
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters the stream
custom_expected: THEN the SLive stream will begin at the live point

title: Scrubber for SLive Content
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a  S-Live content stream from the Hero or Carousel
custom_steps: WHEN the user utilizes the scrubber in the video player
custom_expected:
THEN SLive playback will start from live point

AND the user is able to scrub forward or backwards from live point

title: Live Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a  S-Live content stream from the Hero or Carousel
custom_steps:
WHEN the user utilizes the scrubber in the video player
AND the user is away from the live point
custom_expected:
THEN the Live button at the end of the scrubber is tappable
AND tapping Live (with background, black text) will send the user to the live point

title: Manual Rotate
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches an S-Live stream from the Hero or Carousel
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the rotation button on the video controls
custom_expected:
THEN the S-Live stream will change device orientation from Portrait to Landscape
OR stay the same if tablet is in landscape position

title: Full Screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a live game stream
custom_steps: WHEN  user swipe any direction in video playback
custom_expected: THEN user should exit from playback

title: Swipe Exit
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a live game stream
custom_steps: WHEN the user launch feed
custom_expected: THEN Video Playback should launch fullscreen

title: Portrait Lock
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live game stream
AND has Portrait Lock on Device
custom_steps: WHEN the user Rotate device Horizontal or Vertical
custom_expected: THEN Video Playback should not change regardless of device rotation

title: Portrait UnLock
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live game stream
AND does not have the portrait lock feature enabled on device
custom_steps: WHEN the user rotates their device to landscape
custom_expected: THEN Video Playback should change from portrait to landscape (Full-screen)

title: Manual Rotate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live game stream
AND does NOT have Portrait lock enabled on their device
custom_steps: WHEN the user Rotate device Horizontal or Vertical
custom_expected: THEN video playback should change to Portrait or Landscape

title: Max Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches live content
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the maximize button
custom_expected: THEN Video Playback should change to full-screen

title: Min Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a live  or archived  game stream
custom_steps: WHEN the User tap Minimum Button
custom_expected: THEN Video Playback should change to its minimum size

title: Press Mute Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live content
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the mute button on the video player
OR the user scrubs the volume all the way to the left to mute the video player audio
custom_expected:
THEN no audio should be heard from video playback
AND certain streams such as S-Live content should NOT have a scrubber

title: Increase Volume
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live content
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrubs the video player volume button to higher or lower volume
custom_expected: THEN the video's audio should increase or decrease in volume

title: Decrease Volume
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live OR archived game
custom_steps: WHEN the user press Volume Decrease Button
custom_expected:
THEN Volume should decrease
AND appropriate Animation or Thumbnail should present for decrease volume

title: Metadata
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a live game's Audio feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Audio Player
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Away Team's nickname @ Home Team's Nickname

AND an example would be Athletics @ Pirates

title: Home Team Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches a live game's Audio feed
AND the audio feed is the home team's broadcast
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the audio player
custom_expected:
THEN the home team's tab is enabled
AND the metadata is correct for station
AND the user can confirm the home team's radio broadcast is playing

title: Favorited Team Deeplink
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has launched a live game audio stream
AND the user has a favorited team in the matchup
AND the favorited team is NOT the home team
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the audio stream that is playing at first launch
custom_expected: THEN the favorited team stream will play instead of the default home feed

title: Spanish Audio Deeplink
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has set their device language to Spanish
AND the user launches a live game audio stream
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the audio stream that is launched and playing
custom_expected: THEN the Spanish radio feed will automatically be set as the default audio feed due to ES language in Device Settings

title: Live Button on Video Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has launched a live audio stream
AND the audio stream is paused
custom_steps:
WHEN the user observes the audio player controls
AND the user taps the Live button at the bottom-right of the scrubber (Audacy streams cannot scrub)
custom_expected: THEN the audio stream will resume

title: FF/RW Buttons
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live audio game feed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user observes the audio player controls
AND taps on the RW or FF button
custom_expected:
THEN the user will have the audio stream rewind or fast forward depending on the button selected

Note: Audacy feeds should not include jump buttons

title: Play/Pause Buttons
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live audio game feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the audio player buttons
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to pause/play the stream with the button available

title: Feed Switcher Functionality
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a live audio game feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the audio player page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see displayed:

1. Team Audio Feed Tabs (Away, Home, Spanish)
2. Live audio feeds available for other matchups

title: Paused State Color
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live game audio
custom_steps: WHEN the user pauses the game audio
custom_expected: THEN the Live button will have a white background under black text to show the user that the feed is paused

title: Audio Stream Running
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live audio stream
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the audio player controls for a stream playing live
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a red scrubber bar and a LIVE text on the bottom-right of the scrubber (red dot next to LIVE)

title: Scrubber Locked
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live audio feed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the audio player controls
AND attempt to move the scrubber from the live point
custom_expected:
THEN the user will observe that the scrubber is locked
AND the scrubbing feature cannot be utilized

title: Play/Pause Copy
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live audio feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the copy that displays if the stream is paused or not
custom_expected: THEN the user will see either Now Playing or Stopped (if paused)

title: Play/Pause on Panel
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live game audio
custom_steps:
WHEN the user brings up their control panel on their mobile, tablet device

EX: Swiping down from the top-right of the screen on iOS
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the game being streamed in the control panel

AND the user can play/pause the stream from the control center

title: Control Panel Thumbnail
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live game audio
custom_steps:
WHEN the user brings up their control panel on their mobile, tablet device

EX: Swiping down from the top-right of the screen on iOS

AND the user views the live audio being streamed
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the team logo thumbnail featured

AND it will include the away team / home team

title: Control Panel Volume Scrubber
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live game audio
custom_steps:
WHEN the user brings up their control panel on their mobile, tablet device

EX: Swiping down from the top-right of the screen on iOS

AND the user taps on the live audio being streamed
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to adjust the volume from the volume scrubber featured on the controller

title: Play/Pause on Lock Screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live game audio
custom_steps:
WHEN the user locks their device
AND the user then wakes up their app to display the lock screen
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to tap on the play/pause button on the lock screen for the live audio being streamed

title: Thumbnail on Lock Screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched live game audio
custom_steps:
WHEN the user locks their device
AND the user then wakes up their app to display the lock screen
custom_expected:
THEN the team matchup thumbnail is displayed on the lock screen player

AND the away team / home team logos will be featured

title: Launching another app during playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live game audio stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches another app from their device
AND the new app features audio
custom_expected:
THEN the audio from the MLB app will pause
AND the new app's audio will begin playback

title: Metada and Buttons for Matchups
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a live game audio stream
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the audio metadata on the audio player
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see:

1. Away @ Home - Dodgers @ Reds

2. Time Elapsed ------- Live

3. Play/Pause and other quick action controls

4. Broadcast feeds (LAD-ES, LAD, CIN)

5. Radio Letters under the broadcast feed titles

6. Calendar Date Picker with arrows and calendar launch

7. Matchups, Inning/GameState/Time, Live/Archive Marker

title: Launch Calendar View
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches live game audio stream
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the date in the audio streaming menu
custom_expected:
THEN the monthly calendar modal will display
AND the user can select different dates
